```{r}

library(DBI)
library(odbc)
library(rstudioapi)
library(dplyr)
conn <- dbConnect(odbc(), Driver = "/usr/lib/oracle/23/client64/lib/libsqora.so.23.1",
                  DBQ = "dbora-niva-prod01.niva.corp:1553/NIVABTST", 
                  UID = askForPassword("Oracle username"), 
                  PWD = askForPassword("Oracle password"))
dbExecute(conn, "alter session set current_schema=PHYTOPLANKTON")
```

## Query stations

Borrevann

```{r}
df <- dbGetQuery(conn, "select * from t_stations where station = 'Borrevatn'")
df %>% select(STATIONID, STATION, LAKEID)
```
